text: Sara Luna Santana (born April 16, 1977 in Barcelona) is a goalball player from Spain. She is blind. She is a type B2 goalball player. She played goalball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. Her team was third. She played goalball at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. Her team was second. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Sara Luna Santana
